attributes.action: erect a crowd of (at least 60) life size statues on the green facing the Houses of Parliament - statues of ordinary citizens that would gaze permanently at MPs, Peers & Officials as they left work each day.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government is our Government. Having this work of art would serve to remind our law makers and representatives (and ourselves) that we, the citizens, are always looking, always scrutinsing, always considering the laws being made in our name. The work of art might be entitled 'citizenship & democracy'. A range of people from around the UK could be nominated to become one of the 60 statues.
